com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller

Class AddResourceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller.AddResourceController

  • public class AddResourceController
extends java.lang.Object
    A session scoped, managed bean for user interfaces related to adding a new Resource instance
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Arjumand Fatima <09bicseafatima@seecs.edu.pk>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResourceAttribute attribute
      A instance of ResourceAttribute used to store the relevant data when the user chooses to add a new ResourceAttribute instance.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Resource resource
      A newly created instance of Resource that is to be added in the database
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResourceAttribute> resourceAttributeList
      An ArrayList of ResourceAttribute used to display all the ResourceAttribute(s) newly created related to the new Resource instance that is to be created.
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResAttrValues> resourceAttributeValueList
      An ArrayList of ResAttrValues instances used to display the already added instances of ResAttrValues corresponding to the ResourceAttribute selected by the user.
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResAttrValues> selectedAttributeValueList
      An ArrayList of ResAttrValues instances used to add additional ResAttrValues instances to an instance of ResourceAttribute.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResourceAttribute selectedResourceAttribute
      An instance of ResourceAttribute used to store the ResourceAttribute selected by the user from the user interface.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResAttrValues value
      A instance of ResAttrValues used to store the relevant data when the user chooses to add a new ResAttrValues instance.
